018package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.XMLATTRIBUTE_Id;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getNMTokenValidator;
028
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.URISyntaxException;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.time.LocalDate;
033import java.time.LocalDateTime;
034import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.Set;
037
038import org.apiguardian.api.API;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.IllegalOperationException;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal.XMLElementImpl;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Element;
043
044/**
045 *  <p>{@summary The definition of an XMLElement.}</p>
046 *  <p>The default implementation of the methods
047 *  {@link #addCDATA(CharSequence)},
048 *  {@link #addChild(XMLElement)},
049 *  {@link #addComment(CharSequence)},
050 *  {@link #addText(CharSequence)},
051 *  {@link #setAttribute(String, CharSequence, Optional)},
052 *  {@link #setNamespace(String)},
053 *  {@link #setNamespace(URI)},
054 *  {@link #setNamespace(String,String)},
055 *  {@link #setNamespace(String,URI)},
056 *  and
057 *  {@link #setNamespace(Namespace)}
058 *  will always throw an
059 *  {@link IllegalOperationException};
060 *  classes that implement this interface will have to provide appropriate
061 *  implementations for these methods if they want to support the respective
062 *  feature.</p>
063 *
064 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 *  @version $Id: XMLElement.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $
066 *  @since 0.0.5
067 *
068 *  @UMLGraph.link
069 */
070@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyMethods" )
071@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElement.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $" )
072@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
073public sealed interface XMLElement extends Element
074    permits XMLElementImpl
075{
076        /*---------------*\
077    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
078        \*---------------*/
079    /**
080     *  The flags that are used to configure a new instance of
081     *  {@code XMLElement} (respectively an instance of an implementation of
082     *  this interface.
083     *
084     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
085     *  @version $Id: XMLElement.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $
086     *  @since 0.0.5
087     *
088     *  @UMLGraph.link
089     */
090    @SuppressWarnings( "NewClassNamingConvention" )
091    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElement.java 1030 2022-04-06 13:42:02Z tquadrat $" )
092    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
093    public static enum Flags
094    {
095        /**
096         *  The element allows children.
097         */
098        ALLOWS_CHILDREN,
099
100        /**
101         *  The element allows text.
102         */
103        ALLOWS_TEXT,
104
105        /**
106         *  Only valid attributes can be added to the element (if not set, any
107         *  attribut can be added).
108         */
109        VALIDATES_ATTRIBUTES,
110
111        /**
112         *  Only valid children can be added; this implies that
113         *  {@link #ALLOWS_CHILDREN}
114         *  is set; if the further is set, but this one not, any child can be
115         *  added.
116         */
117        VALIDATES_CHILDREN
118    }
119    //  enum Flags
120
121        /*-----------*\
122    ====** Constants **========================================================
123        \*-----------*/
124    /**
125     *  An empty array of {@code XMLElement} objects.
126     */
127    public static final XMLElement [] EMPTY_XMLElement_ARRAY = new XMLElement [0];
128
129    /**
130     *  The indicator that values for an attribute should not be appended.
131     *
132     *  @see #setAttribute(String, CharSequence, Optional)
133     */
134    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
135    public static final Optional<? extends CharSequence> NO_APPEND = Optional.empty();
136
137        /*---------*\
138    ====** Methods **==========================================================
139        \*---------*/
140    /**
141     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code boolean} value as a {@code CDATA}
142     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
143     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
144     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
145     *  is used.</p>
146     *
147     *  @param  flag    The value.
148     *  @return This instance.
149     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
150     */
151    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
152    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Boolean.toString( flag ) ); }
153
154    /**
155     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
156     *  {@link Boolean}
157     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
158     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
159     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
160     *  is used.</p>
161     *
162     *  @param  flag    The value.
163     *  @return This instance.
164     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
165     */
166    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
167    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ).toString() ); }
168
169    /**
170     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code char} value as a {@code CDATA}
171     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
172     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
173     *  {@link Character#toString(char)}
174     *  is used.</p>
175     *
176     *  @param  c   The character.
177     *  @return This instance.
178     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
179     */
180    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
181    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final char c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Character.toString( c ) ); }
182
183    /**
184     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
185     *  {@link Character}
186     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
187     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
188     *  {@link Character#toString()}
189     *  is used.</p>
190     *
191     *  @param  c   The character.
192     *  @return This instance.
193     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
194     */
195    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
196    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Character c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( c, "c" ).toString() ); }
197
198    /**
199     *  Adds a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.
200     *
201     *  @param  text    The text.
202     *  @return This instance.
203     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
204     */
205    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalOperationException
206    {
207        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No text allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
208    }   //  addCDATA()
209
210    /**
211     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code double} value as a {@code CDATA}
212     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
213     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
214     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
215     *  is used.</p>
216     *
217     *  @param  number  The number.
218     *  @return This instance.
219     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
220     */
221    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
222    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final double number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Double.toString( number ) ); }
223
224    /**
225     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code enum} instance as a {@code CDATA}
226     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
227     *  <p>To convert the value to text, the method
228     *  {@link Enum#name()}
229     *  is used.</p>
230     *
231     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
232     *  @param  value   The value.
233     *  @return This instance.
234     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
235     */
236    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
237    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLElement addCDATA( final E value ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).name() ); }
238
239    /**
240     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
241     *  {@link Instant}
242     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
243     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
244     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
245     *  is used.</p>
246     *
247     *  @param  date    The date.
248     *  @return This instance.
249     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
250     */
251    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
252    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Instant date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
253
254    /**
255     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code int} value as a {@code CDATA}

258     *  {@link Integer#toString(int)}
259     *  is used.</p>
260     *
261     *  @param  number  The number.
262     *  @return This instance.
263     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
264     */
265    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
266    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final int number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Integer.toString( number ) ); }
267

274     *  is used.</p>
275     *

327    /**
328     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
329     *  {@link ZonedDateTime}
330     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
331     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
332     *  {@link ZonedDateTime#toString()}
333     *  is used.</p>

338     */

340    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final ZonedDateTime date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
341
342    /**
343     *  Adds a child to this element.
344     *
345     *  @param  <E> The implementation type for the {@code children}.
346     *  @param  child   The child to add.
347     *  @return This instance.
348     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given child is not valid for
349     *      this element.
350     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No children are allowed for this
351     *      element.
352     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
353     *      not this element.
354     */
355    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
356    public default <E extends XMLElement> XMLElement addChild( final E child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException, IllegalStateException
357    {
358        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No children allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
359    }   //  addChild()
360
361    /**
362     *  Adds a comment.
363     *
364     *  @param  comment The comment text.
365     *  @return This instance.
366     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No comment allowed for this element.
367     */
368    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
369    public default XMLElement addComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalOperationException
370    {
371        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No comment allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
372    }   //  addComment()
373
374    /**
375     *  <p>{@summary Adds predefined markup.}</p>
376     *  <p>The given markup will not be validated, it just may not be
377     *  {@code null}. So the caller is responsible that it will be proper
378     *  markup.</p>
379     *  <p>As the markup may be formatted differently (or not formatted at
380     *  all), the pretty printed output may be distorted when this is used.</p>
381     *
382     *  @param  markup  The predefined markup.
383     *  @return This instance.
384     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No children are allowed for this
385     *      element.
386     */
387    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
388    public default XMLElement addPredefinedMarkup( final CharSequence markup ) throws IllegalOperationException
389    {
390        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No children allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
391    }   //  addPredefinedMarkup()
392
393    /**
394     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code boolean} value as text to this
395     *  element.}</p>
396     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
397     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
398     *  is used.</p>
399     *
400     *  @param  flag    The value.
401     *  @return This instance.
402     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
403     */
404    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
405    public default XMLElement addText( final boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( Boolean.toString( flag ) ); }
406
407    /**
408     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
409     *  {@link Boolean}
410     *  instance as text to this element.}</p>

412     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
413     *  is used.</p>
414     *
415     *  @param  flag    The value.
416     *  @return This instance.
417     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
418     */
419    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
420    public default XMLElement addText( final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ).toString() ); }
421

451    /**
452     *  Adds text to this element. Special characters will be escaped
453     *  according to the rules for the respective SGML flavour.
454     *
455     *  @param  text    The text.
456     *  @return This instance.
457     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
458     */
459    public default XMLElement addText( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalOperationException
460    {
461        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No text allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
462    }   //  addText()
463
464    /**
465     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code double} value as text to this
466     *  element.}</p>
467     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method

469     *  is used.</p>

473     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.

595
596    /**
597     *  Returns the flags for this element.
598     *
599     *  @return The flags.
600     *
601     *  @see Flags
602     */
603    public Set<Flags> getFlags();
604
605    /**
606     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
607     *  <p>The method uses
608     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
609     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
610     *
611     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
612     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value.
613     *  @return This instance.
614     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
615     *      not valid for the element
616     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
617     *      element.
618     */
619    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
620    {
621        return setAttribute( name, Boolean.toString( flag ) );
622    }   //  setAttribute()
623
624    /**
625     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
626     *  <p>The method uses
627     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
628     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
629     *
630     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
631     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
632     *      attribute will be removed.
633     *  @return This instance.
634     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
635     *      not valid for the element
636     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
637     *      element.
638     */
639    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
640    {
641        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( flag ) ? Boolean.toString( flag ) : null );
642    }   //  setAttribute()
643
644    /**
645     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
646     *
647     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
648     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
649     *      attribute will be removed.
650     *  @return This instance.
651     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
652     *      not valid for the element
653     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
654     *      element.
655     */
656    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
657    {
658        return setAttribute( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ), value, NO_APPEND );
659    }   //  setAttribute()
660
661    /**
662     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
663     *
664     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
665     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
666     *      attribute will be removed.
667     *  @param  append  If not
668     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
669     *      ({@link #NO_APPEND}),
670     *      the new value will be appended to an already existing one, and the
671     *      provided char sequence is used as the separator.
672     *  @return This instance.
673     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
674     *      not valid for the element
675     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
676     *      element.
677     */
678    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
679    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
680    {
681        throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "No attributes allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
682    }   //  setAttribute()
683
684    /**
685     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
686     *  <p>The method uses
687     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
688     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
689     *
690     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
691     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
692     *  @return This instance.
693     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
694     *      not valid for the element
695     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
696     *      element.
697     */
698    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final double number ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
699    {
700        return setAttribute( name, Double.toString( number ) );
701    }   //  setAttribute()
702
703    /**
704     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
705     *  <p>The method uses
706     *  {@link Enum#name()}
707     *  to convert the provided value to a {@code String}.</p>
708     *
709     *  @param  <E> The concrete enum type of {@code value}.
710     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
711     *  @param  enumValue   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
712     *      attribute will be removed.
713     *  @return This instance.
714     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
715     *      not valid for the element
716     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
717     *      element.
718     */
719    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final E enumValue ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
720    {
721        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( enumValue ) ? enumValue.name() : null );
722    }   //  setAttribute()
723
724    /**
725     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>

727     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
728     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>

730     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.

732     *      attribute will be removed.
733     *  @return This instance.
734     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
735     *      not valid for the element
736     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
737     *      element.
738     */
739    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final Instant date ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
740    {
741        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );
742    }   //  setAttribute()

849     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
850     *      attribute will be removed.
851     *  @return This instance.

858    {
859        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( date ) ? date.toString() : null );

861
862    /**
863     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided
864     *  value is not empty.}</p>
865     *  <p>The method uses
866     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils#isNotEmpty(CharSequence)}
867     *  to test if the given value is empty.</p>
868     *
869     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
870     *  @param  value   The value for the attribute; can be {@code null}.
871     *  @return This instance.
872     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
873     *      not valid for the element
874     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
875     *      element.
876     */
877    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
878    public default XMLElement setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
879    {
880        if( isNotEmpty( value ) ) setAttribute( name, value );
881
882        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
883        return this;
884    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
885
886    /**
887     *  Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided value is not
888     *  empty.
889     *
890     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
891     *  @param  optional   The value for the attribute.
892     *  @return This instance.
893     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
894     *      not valid for the element
895     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
896     *      element.
897     */
898    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UnusedReturnValue"} )
899    public default XMLElement setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> optional ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
900    {
901        requireNonNullArgument( optional, "optional" ).ifPresent( value -> setAttribute( name, value ) );
902
903        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
904        return this;
905    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
906
907    /**
908     *  <p>{@summary Sets the id for the element.}</p>
909     *  <p>The value will be validated using the method that is provided by a
910     *  call to
911     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getNMTokenValidator()}.</p>
912     *
913     *  @param  id  The id.
914     *  @return This instance.
915     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
916     *      not valid for the element or the value is not a valid NMToken.
917     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
918     *      element.
919     *
920     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#XMLATTRIBUTE_Id
921     */
922    public default XMLElement setId( final String id ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
923    {
924        if( !getNMTokenValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) ) ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "Invalid id: %s", id ) );
925        final var retValue = setAttribute( XMLATTRIBUTE_Id, id );
926
927        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
928        return retValue;
929    }   //  setId()
930
931    /**
932     *  Sets the given namespace.
933     *
934     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
935     *  @return This instance.
936     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
937     *      element.
938     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
939     */
940    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException, URISyntaxException
941    {
942        final var namespace = new Namespace( identifier );
943        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
944
945        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
946        return retValue;
947    }   //  setNamespace()
948
949    /**
950     *  Sets the given namespace.
951     *
952     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
953     *  @return This instance.
954     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
955     *      element.
956     */
957    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final URI identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException
958    {
959        final var namespace = new Namespace( identifier );
960        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
961
962        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
963        return retValue;
964    }   //  setNamespace()
965
966    /**
967     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given namespace.}</p>
968     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
969     *  provided by
970     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
971     *
972     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
973     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
974     *  @return This instance.
975     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
976     *      element.
977     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
978     */
979    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException, URISyntaxException
980    {
981        final var namespace = new Namespace( prefix, identifier );
982        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
983
984        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
985        return retValue;
986    }   //  setNamespace()
987
988    /**
989     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given namespace.}</p>
990     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
991     *  provided by
992     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
993     *
994     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
995     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
996     *  @return This instance.
997     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
998     *      element.
999     */
1000    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException
1001    {
1002        final var namespace = new Namespace( prefix, identifier );
1003        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
1004
1005        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1006        return retValue;
1007    }   //  setNamespace()
1008
1009    /**
1010     *  Sets the given namespace.
1011     *
1012     *  @param  namespace   The namespace.
1013     *  @return This instance.
1014     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
1015     *      element.
1016     */
1017    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
1018    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final Namespace namespace ) throws IllegalOperationException
1019    {
1020        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No namespace allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
1021    }   //  setNamespace()
1022
1023    /**
1024     *  {@inheritDoc}
1025     */
1026    @Override
1027    public <E extends Element> void setParent( final E parent );
1028}
1029//  interface XMLElement
